task.title: Breakfast Burritos
task.shortdesc: Prep time: 20 minutes. Cook time: 5 minutes. Makes: 6 burritos.

ul.li: 1-15oz can black beans, rinsed and drained

step.cmd: Press/drain the tofu overnight to remove water
Pierce sweet potates with fork a few times. Place in microwave on high for 4-6 minutes. Remove the skin and put the potatoes in a medium bowl. Mash with a fork, set aside.
Cook the breakfast sausage according to package directions.
Crumble the tofu into a consistency that resembles scrambled eggs.
In a separate large bowl, add breakfast sausage, black beans, cumin, and chili powder. Stir to combine then set aside.
In a separate bowl, beat egg whites together. Spray a skillet with cooking spray and place over medium-low heat. Cook egg whites, folding every few minutes until cooked.
Add breakfast sausage, black beans, cumin, and chili powder into skillet. Cook for 5 minutes. Remove from heat.
In a large skillet over medium heat, add black beans, cumin, chili powder, and tofu. Cook for 7 minutes. Remove from heat.
To assemble the breakfast burrito, smear some sweet potato over the area of a tortilla. Add the innerds, then roll up.
